name: Swhistlesoft
tag_list: business, free, solutions, software, hardware, seo, design, ecommerce
overview:
Swhistlesoft is a home grown success story originating from the concept of advancing technologies and providing sound solutions to the small and growing business community. Tim Tessier and Mike Frank quickly realized the potential for their drive in the technology industry.

With the technologically focused training they received from the Computer Technologist Course provided by Niagara College of Applied Arts and Technology, they soon realized there was a place for their experience and passion in today’s marketplace.

After graduating, Tim and Mike had a desire to set off into the industry together and pursue various contracts in a quest to hone their skill set, with hopes of one day providing industry leading solutions.

This dedication drove Tim and Mike to eventually start-up a local Niagara Region based company called Swhistlesoft. Now with a combined 20 years experience, Tim and Mike have the tools, knowledge, and experience necessary to handle the fast paced technology driven world we live in with solutions to the ever growing list of technical dilemmas.
